description: various small sections of letterpress printing in various languages and various type fonts; some diagrams (a circular chart in LLQ, a column base at top center, a round diagram in URQ), illustrations (organic designs in LLC, images from stamps and a ticket in LLQ) and bars of music; some sections of handwritten text in various languages including a section at bottom center of possibly Arabic text
inscription:
Signature, Date, Inscription and Stamp

LLC, in pencil: [Artist\'s Proof]
provenance: The artist, Santa Barbara (sold, for $130, to Moir); Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (until d.2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: The Dictionary
